question: Which among the following is the main objective of ATAL Incubators?
explanation: NITI Aayog has established the ATAL Incubators to promote entrepreneurship in the universities and industry. At the university, NGO, SME, and Corporate industry levels, AIM is setting up world-class Atal Incubators (AICs) that would trigger and enable successful growth of sustainable startups in every sector /state of the country. Women-led incubators and entrepreneurial startups are strongly encouraged by AIM(Atal Innovation Mission).
